snippet: Tired of the AutoPlay box in Windows 7 popping up and suggesting a program you never use whenever you insert a disc or connect a USB drive to the computer? Thanks to the AutoPlay settings box, you can customize the programs Windows uses to handle...
abstract: Tired of the AutoPlay box in Windows 7 popping up and suggesting a program you never use whenever you insert a disc or connect a USB drive to the computer? Thanks to the AutoPlay settings box, you can customize the programs Windows uses to handle CD's, DVD's and other types of media on the computer.
lead_paragraph: Tired of the AutoPlay box in Windows 7 popping up and suggesting a program you never use whenever you insert a disc or connect a USB drive to the computer? Thanks to the AutoPlay settings box, you can customize the programs Windows uses to handle CD's, DVD's and other types of media on the computer.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Adjusting Windows' AutoPlay Settings
